content.query:
use secondcars_silver;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.sales
(
    sales_id int,
    ad_placed_on datetime,
    sold_on datetime,
    selling_price VARCHAR(100),
    region VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    seller_type VARCHAR(100),
    owner VARCHAR(100),
    sold VARCHAR(100),
    car_id INT)
with (
    LOCATION='sales/part-00000-60e14114-2119-459e-a55b-e77d9d3baf62-c000.snappy.parquet',
    data_source=secondcars_source,
    FILE_FORMAT=parquet_file_format,
    reject_value=10,
    rejected_row_location='rejections/sales'
);

use secondcars_silver;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.policy
(
    policy_number INT,
    policy_bind_date DATE,
    policy_state VARCHAR(100),
    policy_csl VARCHAR(100),
    policy_deductible INT,
    policy_annual_premium FLOAT,
    umbrella_limit INT,
    car_id INT,
    customer_id INT
)
WITH(
    LOCATION='policy/part-00000-2bbc4a75-b093-4fcd-a18d-ea577a2bebac-c000.snappy.parquet',
    data_source=secondcars_source,
    FILE_FORMAT=parquet_file_format,
    reject_value=10,
    rejected_row_location='rejections/policy'
);

use secondcars_silver;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.customers
(
    CustomerID INT,
    Region VARCHAR(100),
    [State] VARCHAR(100),
    City VARCHAR(100),
    seller_type VARCHAR(50),
    [owner] VARCHAR(50),
    [job] VARCHAR(50),
    Martial VARCHAR(50),
    Education VARCHAR(50),
    [Default] INT,
    Balance INT,
    HHInsurance INT,
    Carloan INT
)
WITH(
    LOCATION='customers/part-00000-8dde0b55-291c-4539-a439-95cac25a72eb-c000.snappy.parquet',
    data_source=secondcars_source,
    FILE_FORMAT=parquet_file_format,
    reject_value=10,
    rejected_row_location='rejections/customers'
);
